title: 286: Nothing but CHAOS with Bekah & Gray
itunes:title: 286: Nothing but CHAOS with Bekah & Gray
description:
Never fear, your captain while Jess is away is HERE… and a Chatty Broads episode has never been more disorganized!! Regardless, Bekah and Grayston have a blast on today’s show. From trying to convince a random wrong number to give life advice, to arguing about prenups… we think you’ll enjoy.

 

CHATTY BROADS MERCH: Purchase this CB merch before it sells out! Click here: https://chattybroads.store/

GET TICKETS TO THE LIVE ONLINE SHOW HERE: https://app.loopedlive.com/c/3679

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***MEJURI: Head to MEJURI.COM/CHATTY for 10% off your first order.

***GIRLFRIEND COLLECTIVE: first-time customers $25 off purchases of $100 or more when you go to GIRLFRIEND.COM/CHATTY

***BEST FIENDS: Download the 5 star rated puzzle game, Best Fiends FREE today on the App Store or Google Play!

***ARTICLE: Get $50 off your first purchase of $100 or more at ARTICLE.COM/CHATTY

***HELLO FRESH: Go to HELLOFRESH.COM/14CHATTY and use code 14CHATTY for up to 14 free meals plus free shipping!

***FORIA: Get 20% off your first order by visiting www.foriawellness.com/chatty OR use code CHATTY at checkout!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
